Target: meddling in the policies of this country

text: Deputy Cilia Flores , chief of bloc of the Fifth Republic Movement [ MVR ] , used the same tone to express her opinion . Without mincing her words , she affirmed : " This is an instance of meddling in the policies of this country , which is a sovereign country . " She added : " Venezuela designs its own policies in an autonomous manner and , in any event , it is up to Venezuelans to decide them . We respect the sovereignty of all countries and this is why we demand respect for ours . "
